TextView.android:text: 1. After tapping the 'Grant' button in the Reclaim Control app, you will be redirected to the 'Usage Access' settings page. 2. Look for the 'Reclaim Control' app in the list of apps and tap on it. 3. Turn on the toggle switch next to 'Allow usage tracking' to give the app access to your device's usage data. 4. You may see a warning message that explains how the app will use this data. Read it carefully and tap 'Allow' to confirm your decision. 5. You have now granted usage access to the Reclaim Control app. You can always turn off this access in the same settings page if you change your mind later.
